columns.feature_id: A unique identifier for each available feature.
columns.feature_type_code: A code representing the type of feature, linking to a reference table for feature types.
columns.feature_name: The name of the feature as it is commonly recognized.
columns.feature_description: A brief description of the feature, providing additional context or details.

Other_Available_Features.table_description: The Other_Available_Features table contains information about various features that can be associated with real estate properties, including their names, descriptions, and types.

columns.property_id: An identifier that uniquely links each property to its features within the real estate database.
columns.feature_id: An identifier that connects to specific available features that can be associated with a property.
columns.property_feature_description: A textual description detailing the characteristics or qualities of the associated property feature.

Other_Property_Features.table_description: The Other_Property_Features table captures the relationship between properties and their distinct features by linking property IDs and feature IDs, along with a description of each feature.

columns.property_id: A unique identifier for each property listed in the database.
columns.property_type_code: A code that categorizes the type of property, such as apartment, house, shop, etc.
columns.date_on_market: The date and time when the property was first made available for sale.
columns.date_sold: The date and time when the property was sold.
columns.property_name: The name or title of the property, often a marketing name.
columns.property_address: The full address of the property, including street, city, state, and ZIP code.
columns.room_count: The total number of rooms in the property, providing an insight into its size.
columns.vendor_requested_price: The price that the seller initially requests for the property.
columns.buyer_offered_price: The price that a potential buyer offers for the property.
columns.agreed_selling_price: The final price agreed upon by the seller and buyer for the transaction.
columns.apt_feature_1: A specific feature or amenity of the property related to its apartment classification.
columns.apt_feature_2: An additional feature or amenity of the property related to its apartment classification.
columns.apt_feature_3: A further feature or amenity of the property related to its apartment classification.
columns.fld_feature_1: A specific feature or amenity related to the property if it is classified as a field.
columns.fld_feature_2: An additional feature or amenity related to the property if it is classified as a field.
columns.fld_feature_3: A further feature or amenity related to the property if it is classified as a field.
columns.hse_feature_1: A specific feature or amenity of the property related to its house classification.
columns.hse_feature_2: An additional feature or amenity of the property related to its house classification.
columns.hse_feature_3: A further feature or amenity of the property related to its house classification.
columns.oth_feature_1: A specific feature or amenity of the property classified under 'other'.
columns.oth_feature_2: An additional feature or amenity of the property classified under 'other'.
columns.oth_feature_3: A further feature or amenity of the property classified under 'other'.
columns.shp_feature_1: A specific feature or amenity of the property if it is classified as a shop.
columns.shp_feature_2: An additional feature or amenity of the property if it is classified as a shop.
columns.shp_feature_3: A further feature or amenity of the property if it is classified as a shop.
columns.other_property_details: Any other relevant information regarding the property that does not fit into the specified categories.

Properties.table_description: The Properties table stores detailed information about real estate properties, including their identification, categorization, pricing, and specific features, enabling comprehensive property management and transactions.

columns.feature_type_code: A unique identifier for each feature type associated with real estate properties.
columns.feature_type_name: A descriptive name for each feature type, detailing the nature or category of the feature.

Ref_Feature_Types.table_description: The Ref_Feature_Types table serves to categorize various features associated with real estate properties, providing both a unique code and a descriptive name for each feature type.

columns.property_type_code: A unique identifier for each type of property.
columns.property_type_description: A descriptive name for the property type, detailing the characteristics or common classifications.

Ref_Property_Types.table_description: The Ref_Property_Types table serves to categorize different types of properties within the real estate database, providing a clear reference for property classification.
